title: Heads up on Moxie Shorts
body:
Just so you know, there are only 50 days left until the submission deadline for Moxie Shorts 2006. I've spoken to several people who are working on films (including a documentary!), so if you're thinking of submitting one too... you better get your butt in gear, man! Word.

This friendly reminder was brought to you by Moxie Shorts 2006.
author: Dan

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
which reminds me...
i already have a moxie t-shirt
... when will i be able to by my moxie shorts?

comments.author: --Jeff
comments.body:
I mis-read that too. I thought it said SHIRTS.

Bring back the Moxie T-Shirts!!!
